attributes.action: To dissolve parliament with immediate affect because parliament has lost all moral authority and no longer represents the views of the people of the United Kingdom.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Why?

The current scandle involving MP's expenses.
The governments attitude regarding the current situation with the Gurkha's settling in the United kingdom highlighted most recently by Joanna Lumley.
The financial recession and debt the united kingdom has accumulated since the Labour party took power in 1997.
The misuse of anti-terror legislation by local authority's and the Government since they have been approved.
The Governments decision to still hold DNA profiles of innocent people for 12 years which is a breach of European human rights legislation

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
